description:
Repository containing the codebase corresponding to the following two papers:


- Amgad M, Atteya LA, Hussein H, Mohammed KH, Hafiz E, Elsebaie MA, Alhusseiny AM, AlMoslemany MA, Elmatboly AM, Pappalardo PA, Sakr RA. NuCLS: A scalable crowdsourcing approach & dataset for nucleus classification and segmentation in breast cancer. (Under review).


- Amgad M, Atteya LA, Hussein H, Mohammed KH, Hafiz E, Elsebaie MA, Mobadersany P, Manthey D, Gutman DA, Elfandy H, Cooper LA. Explainable nucleus classification using Decision Tree Approximation of Learned Embeddings. Bioinformatics. 2021 Sep 29.
name: NuCLS
